## Tuple type

Defines a fixed sized, iterable tuple with elements of type `T` and length `N`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Tuple<T, N extends number> = [T, ...T[]] & {
    length: N;
} & Iterable<T>;
```
